He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, South Korea in the Light Flyweight (-48 kg) division. He won the bronze medal at the event.Olympic Movement's results database Serantes' win was the first time in 24 years that an athlete from the Philippines won an Olympic medal since 1964.
